---
title: "Sun Induced Fluorescence (SIF) and Photosynthesis of Peatland Vegetation Response to Stress"
date: 2016-01-01
categories: [National]
---

**Duration:** 2016-2021  
**Funding:** National Science Centre of Poland (NCN) No. 2016/21/B/ST10/02271 OPUS_11  
**Role:** Project PI

This project investigated the response of peatland vegetation to water deficits and increased temperature under climate manipulation, focusing on sun-induced fluorescence (SIF) and photosynthetic activity using advanced field and remote sensing techniques.
